posts.post_content:
I’ve been selling too much 50s, 60s and 70s.  Time to get back to basics with a good ‘ol T card listing.  

T206 Drum Murphy Batting (trimmed) SGC - Authentic - Trades for Mid grade 52T Robinson, 51B Mays, Or Cobbs considered 

T206 Tolstoi - Cy Young Glove - PSA 4.5 - tiny stain at top - corners are exmt. $5200
T206 Hindu F. Jones.  PSA says 2 - not sure what they see here I was hoping for a 3.5 or 4.  $650
T206 AB460 L. Tannehill PSA 3 - dramatically undergrads perhaps a tiny stain on reverse?  I would grade it Ex+ $500
T213-1 “Coupon” Wilson.  Poor but complete. Three spots of paper loss on back.  Some folks attribute these to T206 - and would be about as tough as Carolina Brights.  Personally I think it’s a separate issue.  $375
T206 Sov460 Duffy PSA 3 $475
T206 Cycle 350 Maddox SGC 40/3 - Centered, nice card $325
T206 Jennings Two Hands AB350 NF PSA 6MC - typically off center for the issue $1400
T206 Huggins AB350 Frame PSA 3.5 $550
T206 Ford Sov460 PSA 3 spot of paper loss on front - $95 over graded to be honest. 
T206 Clancy AB350 Frame PSA 6 MC - nearly perfect centering - I guess it’s the slight oc on the back?  If it doesn’t sell will probably submit to SGC - IMO doesn’t deserve a qualifier - $650
T206 Chase Portrait (blue) P350 Ex+. $275
T206 Devore Batting Sc 350-460 F42 - accurately graded $80


All prices are net to me.  Orders under $100 kindly add $5 for shipping.
Removed all those that sold.  Added one more.
Can I take a look at the Duffy.   [url]Stottlemire800@gmail.com[/url]
